title: Snoopy Style Lamp Black
body: We have the Snoopy Style Lamp, an original design of Achille and Pier Castiglioni to provide a kid-friendly and modernized take on your home. The Snoopy Lamp’s insipiration came from comic writer, Charles Schultz’ “Snoopy” series which the duo revolutionized with their love for innovative materials and modernized techniques.
